Articles.Content:
Hi Everybody!

Trying to get the latest KOS GitHub download to play nicely...

Installed the KOS and Tundra Exploration MODs and can construct a vessel with Tundra parts and scriptable controllers, but when I go to the launch pad I can not get the KOS terminal to appear. Right-clicking the scriptable controller brings up a context menu, but no option to open the KOS terminal. Am I missing something here or is this an incompatibility issue??? 

Thanks!
